title: Where can I get an APUSH textbook? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you trying to study by yourself for the APUSH exam? If your school offers the class you should just check out the textbook from your schools library. If not, I would check the public library near you first to see if there’s anything that might work. However, if you have no problem dropping some cash on a textbook, I would suggest “America’s History.” Here’s a link to it on Amazon (Amazon.com: America’s History, For the AP* Course eBook: James A. Henretta, Eric Hinderaker, Rebecca Edwards, Robert O. Self: Kindle Store). You can even just rent the book.
